title: Introduction
description: Introduce the concept of binary search, explaining its purpose, importance, and intuitive nature using relatable examples. Highlight the necessity of a sorted array for binary search to work effectively.

original_subgoals.title: Introduction
original_subgoals.description: Introduce the concept of binary search and its intuitive nature using a relatable example.

original_subgoals.title: Introduction to Binary Search
original_subgoals.description: Introduce the concept of binary search, explaining its purpose and importance in finding elements quickly in a sorted array.

title: Binary Search Explanation
description: Explain the basic concept and step-by-step process of binary search using an example with a sorted integer array. Emphasize the importance of the array being sorted and how the algorithm divides the array, ruling out half of the elements at each step.

original_subgoals.title: Binary Search Explanation
original_subgoals.description: Explain the basic concept of binary search using an example with a sorted integer array, highlighting the importance of the array being sorted.

original_subgoals.title: Binary Search Process
original_subgoals.description: Explain the step-by-step process of binary search, including dividing the array and ruling out half of the elements at each step.

title: Algorithm Efficiency
description: Discuss the efficiency of the binary search algorithm, explaining how it reduces the search space and operates in logarithmic time complexity.

original_subgoals.title: Algorithm Efficiency
original_subgoals.description: Discuss the efficiency of the binary search algorithm, explaining how it reduces the search space and the concept of logarithmic time complexity.

title: Implementation Methods
description: Describe how to implement binary search both recursively and iteratively. Include the base case and recursive case logic for the recursive implementation, and explain how to modify this approach to use a loop for the iterative implementation.

original_subgoals.title: Recursive Implementation
original_subgoals.description: Describe how to implement binary search recursively, including the base case and recursive case logic.

original_subgoals.title: Iterative Implementation
original_subgoals.description: Explain how to implement binary search iteratively by modifying the recursive approach to use a loop instead of recursion.

original_subgoals.title: Implementing Binary Search
original_subgoals.description: Detail the implementation of binary search, including setting bounds, calculating midpoints, and updating bounds based on comparisons.

title: Implementation Challenges
description: Discuss common challenges programmers face when implementing binary search, such as understanding the problem correctly and ensuring bounds converge correctly. Explain how to reason about the correctness of the implementation.

original_subgoals.title: Challenges in Implementation
original_subgoals.description: Discuss common challenges programmers face when implementing binary search and the importance of understanding the problem correctly.

original_subgoals.title: Reasoning About Correctness
original_subgoals.description: Explain how to reason about the correctness of the binary search implementation, ensuring bounds converge correctly.

title: Defining Search Outcome
description: Decide on the outcome of the search, such as returning the index of the element or handling cases where the element is not found. Rephrase the binary search problem to ensure a unique solution, such as determining where to insert an element to maintain order.

original_subgoals.title: Defining the Search Outcome
original_subgoals.description: Decide on the outcome of the search, such as returning the index of the element or handling cases where the element is not found.

original_subgoals.title: Rephrasing the Problem
original_subgoals.description: Rephrase the binary search problem to ensure a unique solution, such as determining where to insert an element to maintain order.

title: Understanding Array Properties
description: Clarify the properties needed for binary search, emphasizing the arrangement of elements rather than strict sorting. Discuss the use of optional parameters for bounds and the importance of validating input parameters.

original_subgoals.title: Understanding Array Properties
original_subgoals.description: Clarify the properties needed for binary search, emphasizing the arrangement of elements rather than strict sorting.

original_subgoals.title: Optional Parameters and Validity Checks
original_subgoals.description: Discuss the use of optional parameters for bounds and the importance of validating input parameters.

title: Binary Search Variations
description: Explore variations of binary search, such as finding the first or last occurrence of an element, and the concept of bisect left and right. Introduce the Python bisect library as a tool for implementing binary search efficiently and correctly.

original_subgoals.title: Variations of Binary Search
original_subgoals.description: Explore variations of binary search, such as finding the first or last occurrence of an element, and the concept of bisect left and right.

original_subgoals.title: Using Bisect Library
original_subgoals.description: Introduce the Python bisect library as a tool for implementing binary search efficiently and correctly.

title: Conclusion
description: Summarize the binary search implementations and encourage applying the algorithm to other data types, emphasizing the requirement for sorted data. Conclude the tutorial with a summary and encourage viewers to engage with the content by subscribing or liking the video.

original_subgoals.title: Conclusion and Application
original_subgoals.description: Summarize the binary search implementations and encourage applying the algorithm to other data types, emphasizing the requirement for sorted data.

original_subgoals.title: Conclusion and Call to Action
original_subgoals.description: Conclude the tutorial with a summary and encourage viewers to engage with the content by subscribing or liking the video.
